Description:
Immaculate Family Home with Views and Nothing To Do!
This immaculately presented family home has beautiful valley views which will inspire you. Privately located on 3/4 of a sunny acre at the end of a court, the home offers something for everyone. The family friendly floorplan offers 4 great sized bedrooms all with built in robes including the Master with lovely valley views, walk in robe & spacious ensuite with double shower at one end of the home. You then have a loft style 5th bedroom or home office/studio with walk in robe & contemporary ensuite which has its own access & sun deck, perfect for teenagers, friends or extended family. The galley style kitchen is light & bright with ample storage & quality, stainless appliances & it has a handy servery opening to the sunken formal lounge with ambient open brick fire place & a bay window for admiring the outlook. Add to this a spacious dining room, a family room with cosy wood heater & a study zone. Both living rooms open out to the fantastic undercover deck which overlooks the solar heated pool & the views beyond. Features of the home are many & include high ceilings, floorboards, quality carpets, gas ducted heating, split system cooling & mains gas & water are connected. Outside is every man's dream with a 12 x 8m shed with concrete floor, power & 3m high roller doors, a double remote garage & a double carport, garden shed & you'll love the automatic gates & sealed driveway. For the gardener there's an orchard, vegie patch, lush lawns & ample scope to create the garden of your dreams. This beautifully presented home really does have it all & will be snapped up quickly so don't delay in booking your own private inspection and start living the dream.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
Huge Block Huge Opportunity!
Ideally located and surrounded by privately set landscaped gardens is this well presented Cedar home. This home will suit many purposes, whether you are a first homebuyer, looking for an investment property or perfect for a family looking for a big yard for the kids to play. The home consists of three good sized bedrooms and open plan play room or study. The kitchen is light and bright and adjoins the meals area, open plan lounge, separate rumpus or forth bedroom with separate access, well suited to working from home, and family bathroom. Outside offers double carport and ample area for outdoor entertaining. A great opportunity!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Limestone Masterpiece On A Private 1.4 Acres
This stunning handcrafted limestone home is wonderfully unique and has been built to ensure the lucky new owner will enjoy years of peace and privacy.
Boasting an open plan lounge and family room with feature parquetry flooring, soaring high ceilings, and a magnificent limestone feature fireplace which is home to a built in wood heater. The quality timber and sandstone kitchen is located in the heart of the home and features quality appliances including dishwasher, plenty of cupboard space and is ideal for the chef in the family. There are 3 generously sized bedrooms all with BIR’s and a classic family bathroom complete with a claw foot bath.
Special features include led light windows, limestone walls throughout the home, the perfect use of natural timbers, sweeping verandas that surround the home, ducted vacuum, ducted heating and large windows to allow natural light to flow through.
Outside the usable allotment of approx. 1.4 acres featuring fruit trees, veggie garden, chicken coop, 2 large water tanks, 4 car carport, a second driveway that leads to a double garage with workshop which comes complete with concrete floor and power.
Picturesque gardens surround the home and there is plenty of area to entertain with a timber decked gazebo, sandstone paving, outdoor undercover fireplace and extensive decked areas all accessed via timber boardwalks.
This is a truly unique home and is perfect for those looking for an artistic retreat or just wanting the solitude that only the hills can offer.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.
Insights: 5 Doonaha Road, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2016 and 38 other 3 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
Private Paradise, Your Perfect First Home!
This character home is well located being close to Cockatoo Township, shops, cafes and public transport and with a only 15 minutes' drive to Pakenham. Nestled amongst a private, sun filled acre of fern filled gardens and natural bush, it makes the ideal first home or country getaway. The home has been lovingly maintained and offers 2 bedrooms, large lounge, contemporary bathroom and sunny kitchen and meals area. The renovated kitchen has everything you need including dishwasher, gas cooktop and ample storage. Features of the home include original polished floorboards, character bay window and fabulous entertaining deck perfect for entertaining or just sitting and enjoying the serene outlook. Outside you'll find plenty of parking space, a garden shed, meandering gardens and lawn, raised vegie garden and a creek with bridge giving the property charm and character. This lovely home will delight many buyers and in this price range will not be on the market long, so be quick to book your private inspection before it's gone.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
10 acres with captivating views to Western Port Bay
Live the life of serene luxury that you deserve, with this picturesque property offering expansive views of the surrounding hillside, as far as Western Port Bay.
A custom-built Fasham design, this stunning home offers open plan living strategically planned to bring the outdoors in; making a feature out of its beautifully landscaped surrounds and daily changing sunsets. The kitchen overlooks the dining and living areas encouraging an interactive lifestyle. The family chef will be right at home with abundant preparation space and storage, along with a walk-in pantry and island bench.
A paved entertainment area wraps around the South-Westerly side of the house, featuring a top-of-the-range built-in barbecue. An in-ground trampoline and ten-metre swimming pool offer endless entertainment during the day, and by night the family can enjoy spending time by the bonfire enjoying the peaceful surrounds. Grow your own organic food, with six established vegetable planter boxes, fruit trees, chicken coop, and a worm farm to make your own fertiliser. The paddocks might further be used for livestock of your own choosing!
The master bedroom features a Northerly aspect, with a private ensuite and walk-in robe. The remaining three bedrooms all feature built-in robes, and share a bathroom with separate toilet alongside the rumpus room that offers another, more secluded living space. For more space, the property comes with approved plans for an extension! Additional features include a wood fireplace, ducted heating, fully appointed laundry, 37,000 litre water tanks, carport, and approximately seven-acres of paddock.
For commuters, Melbourne CBD is an easy hour drive along the Monash Freeway. Just four minutes from the Cockatoo township, eight minutes from Emerald, and 20 minutes from Berwick, this gorgeous home is just moments from multiple thriving and caring communities. Afforded the benefits of private living with well-facilitated townships nearby, you can enjoy the best of both worlds!
Insights: 74 Paternoster Road, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2017 and 20 other 4 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
Ideal First Home or Investment on Almost 1/3 Acre!
This is the perfect package for those looking to buy their first home or for the astute investor. Within walking distance to town, this low maintenance brick home is set back off the road for privacy with sealed driveway, attractive front yard and if you're a tradie or have a caravan or boat there is easy access to the rear yard for parking. The home is neat and tidy and offers 3 bedrooms, family room, open kitchen and dining, family bathroom with separate toilet, laundry and the home has mains gas ducted heating for cosy, convenient warmth in the cooler months. The terraced rear yard is sunny and open and is fully fenced and for storage there is loads of space under the house as well as a garden shed. In addition all mains services are connected, including gas, water, sewer & phone. Properties in this price range are not on the market long and with this home's location and solid, low maintenance construction it is bound to sell quickly.

Description:
Character Mud Brick, Walk to Cockatoo!
You'll fall in love with this character filled Mud Brick home, perfectly located within walking distance to Cockatoo shops, cafes, schools and public transport. Using recycled Oregon and Ironbark timbers, gorgeous leadlight windows the home is rustic yet with modern elements as seen in the bathrooms and kitchen. Spanning over three levels and featuring 2 bedrooms on the lower level including the Master with garden views and contemporary ensuite and lounge room with cosy wood heater. On the second level is the entrance, third bedroom, family bathroom and lovely modern kitchen with stone bench tops, ample storage and stainless gas cooktop, dishwasher and rear garden outlook. The third level features a fantastic second living area, light, spacious and kept comfortable year round with split system heating and cooling. The lovely garden out the front is private and the rear yard is low maintenance complete with plenty of lawn for the kids, cubby house and huge hen house. For vehicles there's an oversized double garage with concrete floor, workshop space, power, water and with internal access for convenience. Mud brick homes have a uniqueness all their own and with this homes style and location it's a must see and will not be on the market long
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
Owner Builder Oasis
Featured in Owner Builder magazine and boasting award-winning leadlight features, this treasured family residence is being offered to market for the first time. Set upon 12 successful acres this property includes a large family home, hazelnut and fruit trees, 5 paddocks, enormous workshop with office, and 1 bedroom cottage.
With granite stones hand picked from Boral Quarries in Coldstream, this home presents a grand exterior, while inside beats the heart of a family home. Of generous proportions are 4 bedrooms, home office, formal and informal dining, and additional piano room for cozy nights in. Open wood fires in the main living area and main bedroom and a sunny conservatory off the central lounge provide space and seasonal enjoyment. Dormer windows, delightful window benches, a generous art studio, and library with leafy outlooks are just some of the features that adorn this prized residence. The open plan kitchen with generous pantry sits atop a cellar, ideal for the collector or for the fruit tree bounty.
Add to this the 1 bedroom cottage with its own fenced paddock, full kitchen, and deck. The workshop has double sliding doors and truck access, this property has been utilized to its full potential.
A truly impressive property with an outstanding list of features to admire. Plan your inspection today
- 48,500 sq m approx. land
- Walking distance to shops and oval
- 4 bedroom home
- 1 bedroom cottage
- 360m2 workshop

Description:
Light Filled, Fully Renovated Home on 3/4 Acre with Shed!
This gorgeous light filled home has been tastefully renovated and leaves you nothing left to do but move in and enjoy. Situated on 3/4 acres of cleared and natural bush to give you privacy and offers 5 bedrooms or 4 with study all with built in robes the Master with walk in robe and ensuite. The heart of the home is the gorgeous open plan kitchen, dining and family room, a large and inviting space with access to the huge undercover entertaining deck with pool, perfect for entertaining the masses with peaceful tree outlook. The kitchen is contemporary with white cabinetry, massive pantry, new stainless appliances and beautiful stone bench tops, and on the other side of the kitchen is the formal lounge. Features include mains gas ducted heating, split system cooling and wood heater for cosy ambience, ducted vacuum system, pine floorboards, new carpets and new quality blinds. Outside the man of the house is going to love the oversize garage with concrete floor, power, toilet and hand basin, wood heater and roller door, suitable for so many business or pleasure uses. The garden is landscaped with low maintenance in mind with drought tolerant plants and the use of sleepers gives it a rustic country feel, add to this veggie patches which are watered by tank water, mains water is connected. This beautiful home has everything you need and more, book your private inspection to avoid disappointment.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
Perfect First Home on 1/3 Acre!
This is the perfect first home for young families, astute investors or tradies and is ready for you to move straight in and enjoy. Well located within walking distance to Cockatoo shops, cafes and public transport the home offers elevated vistas over the valley on over a 1/3 of an acre block. The home features 3 bedrooms, the Master with as new ensuite, open plan living, dining and kitchen with gas cooking and ample storage, sunny deck area and undercover entertaining area for year round family gatherings. Features of the home include gas heating, toasty wood heater, floorboards and for convenience all services are connected. For vehicles there is a 3 car carport, 2 double garages in tandem with concrete floor and power for all your vehicle storage and workshop needs. You'll love the sealed driveway, the sunny open lawn at the front and low maintenance gardens and the property is fully fenced for safely of the little ones or your fury friends. There is a lot to like about this property and at an affordable price range it will not be on the market long.

Description:
COTTAGE CUTIE ON A USEABLE 1 ACRE!
Standing proudly overlooking your own private & spacious 1 acre allotment this cute cottage style home is ready to welcome a new family. The home offers 3 bedrooms plus study, (room for ensuite if desired), air-conditioning and gas heating, security system, open plan living area plus a separate play room for the kids and plenty of storage. There is a spacious kitchen offering gas cooking & plenty of cupboard space, plus there is a large rear covered pergola & sunny front verandah to entertain or relax surrounded by the sounds of the local wildlife. Outside there is plenty of open lawn areas & sunshine to be enjoyed plus a garden shed & a single lock up garage/workshop. Located within walking distance to the shops, transport, schools & sporting facilities this home certainly will not last long – call us & arrange your inspection today!!!

Description:
Spacious Family Home on a Private 1 Acre!
This lovely spacious split level home is privately located at the rear of the 1 acre block with elevated vistas from the deck running the length of the home. On offer are 4 bedrooms which are conveniently located on the top level, all with built in robes, the Master with walk in robe and updated ensuite, there is also a handy study nook with ample space for 2 or 3 computers. Step down to the beautiful new kitchen with plenty of storage, stainless appliances and which is open plan with the family room with floor to ceiling windows to allow for lots of natural light. From the kitchen you can access the dining and formal lounge room with windows the whole expanse of the room again allowing for lots of natural light, there is also an open fire place for cosy nights in. Features of the home include polished floorboards, mains gas ducted heating, quality carpets and for entertainers you'll love the front deck with undercover BBQ area and with trailing ornamental grape vine and kiwi vine. The rear yard is fully fenced complete with cubby house and chicken sheds and cars are covered with a double carport and a single carport with workshop attached. Book your private inspection and make this your new home.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

From inside to out the features continue with a rear and front decks that are surrounded by established gardens and plenty of room for the kids to play, heaps of off street park and a 3 car garage with concrete floor and power, plus the back yard is fully fenced and within walking distance to Cockatoo Main Street. All these features and many more so be quick to inspect as it won’t last long.

Description:
'Springfern'- Rural Retreat with Total Privacy and Northerly Aspect
Set on approximately 66 acres with the majority rolling pastures with a few acres of bush and 6 dams, this architecturally designed home is the ideal lifestyle getaway. The house is stretched out over approximately 50 squares of zoned living spaces including the huge games room with wet bar that is ideal for entertaining as it opens out to the paved area surrounding the inground pool. There are 5 bedrooms including master with walk in robe, ensuite and parents retreat/study, whilst the other bedrooms are discretely zoned away from the main entertaining area and have their own separate living room and bathroom. Entertaining is a delight with the central large kitchen opening onto a deck near the pool and also overlooking the dining and lounge room with its wood heater. Outside there is a large barn with mezzanine level, concrete floor and power, machinery shed, 2 cattle crush yards, horse shelters and 11 paddocks. Special features include beautiful recycled timbers including oregon, jarrah and ironbark, 2 hot water services, 3 bathrooms and 4 toilets, beautiful stone fireplace, wood heater, zoned slab heating, dishwasher, double lock up garage, 20,000 gallon water tanks, fish pond and so much more!!!. Don't hesitate to inspect this home that offers so many benefits close to the great hills townships of Cockatoo, Gembrook & Emerald - all this is less than 1 hours drive from Melbourne!
Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429684522 or Dineke Simpson on 0433 658 777 to arrange your inspection today!
Due to strong market conditions please call before the open to confirm that it is still going ahead.

Description:
Great Buy with Lovely Street Appeal!
They say first impressions are lasting and so it is with this lovely presented home with street appeal that impresses with thoughtful manicured landscaping, sandstone path leading down from the pretty gate, brick paving and blue stone steps. Situated on a quarter acre block and within walking distance to Cockatoo shops and public transport it represents great value. The inside of the home leaves you with nothing to do with fresh paint throughout, newly installed mains gas ducted heating, split system cooling, new carpets and window furnishings. The home offers 3 bedrooms with built in robes, open plan living and dining and modern kitchen with clever storage, dishwasher and lovely granite bench tops. Add to this an undercover outdoor entertaining deck with elevated vistas and which overlooks the neat rear yard, carport, all services connected and you have the perfect first home or fantastic investment property. Book you private inspection today as properties of this quality and price are not on the market long.

Description:
Picture Perfect Entertainer Paradise On A 1/4 Acre
Perfectly located in the sunny hills town of Cockatoo, you will find this beautifully renovated split level weatherboard home perfect for the family or first home buyer alike. Sitting proudly on a landscaped 1124m2 (approx.) allotment, this home is ready to move in and enjoy with nothing more to do. Boasting a stunning modern kitchen with 900mm oven/stove plus dishwasher, soaring high ceilings, lounge with adjoining meals area that offers a large covered deck with outdoor blinds ready for year round entertaining. There is also 3 spacious bedrooms, including master with WIR and renovated ensuite, study nook along, modern family bathroom and plenty with plenty of storage.
Special features include gas log fire and split system heating and cooling, floating timber floors, light modern color scheme and a beautiful private outlook.
Outside you will find plenty of under house storage, garden shed, made paths and plenty of room for a garage STCA, all of this is located close to schools, shops and public transport. Call today this home won’t last long!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Picturesque Family Living On 1/2 An Acre
On offer for the first time is this delightful craftsman built home, situated on a beautiful 1/2 acre (approx) property in a prime location opposite Wrights Forrest.
This stunning property offers unsurpassed quality and style throughout with plenty of room for the largest of families. Boasting 4 spacious bedrooms, master with ensuite & walk in robe, modern bathroom, a stunning hostess style kitchen that offers waterfall stone benchtops, quality appliances including dishwasher and opening up to a large light filled lounge, dining and meals area.
There is separate accommodation under roof line and comprises one large bedroom with BIR, stunning ensuite with large shower, a light filled living room and a modern kitchenette. This would be ideal as a guest room, teenager's retreat or for extended family. Special features include, light bright colour scheme, quality carpets, gas ducted heating and split system heating and cooling.
Outside you will discover a lovingly tendered established garden, that offers a paved courtyard, large lawn areas, veggie patch, fruit trees and a covered outdoor entertaining area, that is the ideal place to sit back and enjoy the beauty the hills has to offer.
This beautiful property also comes with a brick double lock up garage, with workshop and a sealed driveway.
All of this plus so much more within easy access to schools, shops, public transport and multiple walking tracks. Call today, inspection is a must!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Resort Living at its Finest on 2.5 Acres!
Looking for a property that ticks all the boxes for the family who play together & have fun, this is it! Located on 2.5 acres of landscaped gardens & natural bush this place has it all. Enter from the sealed road past the open front lawn then past the beautifully landscaped dam which gives you privacy from the world beyond & from here you can't help but notice the solid majestic construction of the home with huge timber beams & undercover entertaining decks running the length & side of the home. Step inside & you're greeted by grand cathedral ceilings, skylights, exposed timber beams & large living areas. The smart floorplan was design with family Living & entertaining in mind with 5 bedrooms plus study, Master with walk in robe & ensuite. The large central family room with wood heater flows through to the chefs' kitchen with loads of storage, island bench & 900 gas cooktop which then flows through to the kids play room & laundry. On the other side of the family room is a third living area perfect for a gym or games room. The home has celling fans & split systems for comfort all year round & polished hardwood floors as well as low maintenance tiled flooring. Imagine Christmas lunch with the whole family underneath the rear entertaining undercover entertaining area with access to the salt water solar heated in ground pool, fully fenced with stainless steel for the utmost in safety. Add to this a massive 13.5M x 10.5M Barn style shed with concrete floor & power, circular drive complete with palm trees, wood shed & more cleared lawn area for the kids to run around. This fantastic home has so much to offer & will be snapped up before Christmas so book your private inspection today, you will not be disappointed.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Family Living at its Best in a Great Location!
Modern with a touch of rustic, you'll love the charm and space of this home. Situated just a short walk to everything Cockatoo has to offer and being owned by a landscaper the home sits amongst beautifully landscaped gardens with care taken with plant choices for foliage colour and texture adding interest throughout. The home offers 4 bedrooms, 3 with built in robes, the Master with walk in robe and ensuite and which opens out to a large balcony, perfect for your morning coffee. The bathrooms are contemporary and there is a study and 2 living areas. The chef's kitchen and open plan dining room has features such as lovely timber bench tops, loads of storage, stainless appliances including dishwasher and gas cooktop and the kitchen has a handy servery to the top level entertaining deck. The upstairs living room has a cosy wood heater and split system and the second living area is on the lower level and is huge with a bar and bi folding doors opening onto the sunken patio entertaining area complete with water feature. Add to this mains gas ducted heating, split system cooling, ceiling fans, new floating floors and window furnishings and quality carpets. The kids will love the landscaped back yard with lush lawn and their own cubby house and the property is fully fenced so they and your fury friends can play in safety. For vehicles there is plenty of off street parking and also vehicle access to the rear yard. This home has a lot to offer and will appeal to many, so don't miss out; book your private inspection today!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Offering a flexible floor plan, the home can be used as a 4 bedroom home or a 3 bedroom home with two living areas - the choice is yours! Featuring lounge room, master bedroom with ensuite and WIR, study nook adjoining the second bedroom, gas ducted heating, family bathroom with spa bath and an updated kitchen with adjoining meals area. Outside you will find a large covered entertaining area, a spacious backyard and a double carport on a sealed driveway with rear yard access and large garden shed. Set back off the road and ideally located within walking distance to schools, shops and public transport - makes this home a great first home, investment or family retreat! Description:
WELCOME TO ELTRYM ON OVER ½ AN ACRE
‘Eltrym’ was originally built around the 1940’s & overtime has been the centre of many happy family memories. The character & charm of this weatherboard home creates an ambience of both comfort & space with high ceilings, spacious living areas, hardwood timber floors, double hung windows & a picture perfect view from every window of the greenery & privacy that surrounds. Partially renovated the home offers a beautiful new kitchen with stainless steel double oven, renovated ensuite, a new roof, concrete stumps, new gas ducted heating, re-wiring with new light fixtures & painted throughout internally. There are still a few items to be completed but at this price it certainly won’t last long! The floorplan offers a spacious master bedroom, large light filled living areas which includes a separate dining/family room & a big games room/workshop downstairs plus car accommodation. Nestled on over ½ an acre which offers plenty of useable sunny space, a chook pen, cubby house, vegie patch & secure yard for the kids & pets to play. Be quick to inspect this one!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure that the open for inspection is going ahead.
